questions.text: How satisfied are you with our overall service?
How easy was it to navigate our website or application?
How would you rate the responsiveness of our customer support?
How would you rate the quality of the service you received?
How do you rate the value for money of our service?
How satisfied are you with the quality of our product or service?
How clear and helpful were our communications (emails, notifications, etc.)?
How well did our product/service meet your expectations?
How likely are you to recommend our service to others?
How likely are you to continue using our service in the future?
